articles.title: Fears that Bedford’s R-rate has gone above 1 as council awaits details how local lockdowns will work - Bedford Today
articles.description: Bedford’s mayor is worried that the borough’s crucial R-rate might have gone above the critical level needed to control the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content: Having an R-rate below one means covid-19 is on the way to being wiped out, but a rate above one means it risks running out of control as each person with the disease gives the infection to more than… [+2495 chars]
